articles.description: Days after Erika Beccera gave birth to baby Diego, she died from COVID-19. Doctors at Henry Ford Hospital induced labor as the virus took over.
articles.content:
ECORSE, Mich. (FOX 2) - A Detroit mother lost her battle with COVID-19 shortly after giving birth. The 33-year-old woman passed away before she could even hold her newborn son.
